contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3d day of June, 1994, it is hereby ordered that the request for stay filed by petitioner Ricardo Foy is denied.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to thé unavailability of LARSEN, J.; see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
